nodes.text: Moufs were medium-sized, solitary creatures that often got together to feed or mate. They were very touchy creatures with extremely slow metabolisms who survived on minimal food resources, including the bark of dying trees. The Mouf thrived in the Dead Forest on Kashyyyk and were hunted by the Sayormi for their hide, which provided excellent insulation and was often used in their battle armor.

Mouf's appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.

A concept art (titled "bear") and a game model of a mouf in the book From Pencil to Pixel: The Art of Star Wars Galaxies show that moufs were originally conceived as creatures of the planet Corellia for Star Wars Galaxies. They were not included in the base game, but were later used for the planet Kashyyyk in the second expansion, Rage of the Wookiees.
